data.name: Treasure Hunter Claire
data.detailed_description:
The battle between the Hero and the Demon King has come to an end, and the world is at peace. However, monsters are still wreaking havoc throughout the land, and humans have teamed up with demons to subdue the rampaging threat. In this relatively peaceful world, there lives a treasure hunter named Claire. Hearing talk of a treasure that can grant any wish, she travels to the fabled land of Alstroemeria.

One thing leads to another and she ends up accidentally summoning the goddess of the land, who informs her that the blood of a hero flows through her veins. While everyone's been living peacefully, a villain who wants to bring the world to ruin has been making his move, trying to find the same treasure Claire is after!

Now it's up to Claire and her friends to find the treasure, stop this mysterious villain, and save Alstroemeria before it's too late!

Step into the shoes of Claire, the newest adventurer in town! Take on quests from the guild to raise your status and acquire hints about where the more valuable artifacts might be hiding!

As you explore the world, you can find a variety of gear as well as outfits that can be upgraded to gain a better edge in battle!

Of course, you don't have to do all this alone. In town and in the wilds, you can find a variety of other adventurers who might be willing to lend a hand if you befriend them. There are several events for each party member that give you an opportunity to learn more about them, and depending on who you befriend, the story might even change...

Tons of Quests to Tackle

Take on a bunch of different quests from the Adventurer's Guild, whether they involve helping townsfolk or playing into the hands of corrupt nobles...

A Large Ensemble Cast of Characters

Alstroemeria is filled with quirky characters you can befriend, be it a reformed bandit leader, a noble descendant of dragons, or a sharp-tongued half-demon.

Voiced Main Cast

All of the key scenes are fully voiced, making it all the easier to get invested in the action.

Clothing System

Collect and upgrade several different outfits that you can mix and match as you see fit, with everything you wear being reflected both in town and in battle!

data.short_description: Treasure Hunter Claire is the story of the titular protagonist, Claire, and her adventure through the fabled land of Alstroemeria. What treasures and riches await her as she navigates the world?
data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
